title: Best of the Program | Guest: Tim Stewart | 12/6/21
description:
Tim Stewart, president of the U.S. Oil & Gas Association, joins Glenn to discuss the Biden oil crisis. CNN has officially let Chis Cuomo go, and Stu and Glenn discuss the possible reasons why. Jason Buttrill joins Glenn and Stu to discuss how abysmally the Biden administration has performed on the global stage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
